name: Baseball Stars II
overview: If you enjoyed Baseball Stars, then you will love Baseball Stars II from Romstar! All the grand slam action found in the original game is still here: acquire, release or trade players; develop your rookies into superstars; challenge a friend or the program to a single or league game. Baseball Stars II also features: four different stadiums; eighteen teams, six of which you can customize; normal and split-screen views; error counters; various outfielder formations; detailed stats with memory backup for league mode!
